tool.name: Touches
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputEntity1 False isArrayInputEntity2 False name Touches InputEntity1 $InputEntity1 InputEntity2 $InputEntity2 prefer $prefer response $response

param.name: InputEntity1
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry to compare against. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: InputEntity2
param.label: the other geometry
param.help: the other geometry to compare against. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

tool.help: Generates a new geometry which is the region of intersection of the two geometries operated on.
